sentences.sentence: Saying so, he unveils the sheet of calico from the corpse.
sentences.translation: 他一边说着一边撤下了那块盖在尸体上的白布。

sentences.sentence: The Calico Solar project has faced numerous legal and financial hurdles since its inception.
sentences.translation: Calico太阳能项目从项目一开始到现在，已经遇到很多法律上和商务上的障碍。

sentences.sentence: Nicknamed calico Jack because he always wore a shirt and pants made out of colorful calico material.
sentences.translation: 他的绰号叫“印花棉布杰克”，因为他总是穿着一套用花哨的印花棉布做成的衬衫和裤子。
